HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth  - NAV, Portfolio and Performance | HDFC Mutual FundsHDFC Mid Cap FundEquityDIRECTREGULARAn open ended equity scheme predominantly investing in mid cap stocks.
The Scheme shall follow a predominantly Mid cap strategy with a minimum exposure of 65% to Mid-Cap stocks. The Scheme may also seek participation in other equity and equity related securities to achieve optimal portfolio construction.
The aim of equity strategy will be to predominantly build a portfolio of mid-cap companies which have:
a) reasonable growth prospects
b) sound financial strength
c) sustainable business models
d) acceptable valuation that offers potential for capital appreciation.

FAQsCan I invest in SIP and Lump Sum of HDFC Mid Cap Fund ?Yes, SIP as well as Lump Sum investments are permitted with the minimum application amount being ₹100. Any additional purchase must have a minimum amount of ₹100. The SIP and Lumpsum are available in direct and regular plan with both Growth and IDCW option. How to Invest in HDFC Mid Cap Fund ?Investors can apply for their transactions requests either offline or electronically using the relevant application / transaction request forms available on our website or at any of our Officials Points of Acceptance.The application form/transaction slip for subscription/ redemption/ switches can be submitted at our Official Points of Acceptances whose addresses are available on the website of the AMC.
